bibl.title: Why did the Villages in the Themistou Meris Die in the 4th century AD? New Ideas about an Old Problem.
bibl.note: Elaborated version of a paper given at the International Conference on ""Natural and Cultural Landscapes in the Fayum, Safeguarding and Management of Archaeological Sites and Natural Environments"" organized by the Istituto Italiano di Archeologia, Cairo, in the Auberge du Lac, Fayum, 31 October - 2 November 2010.

bibl.title: Das Fayyûm in Hellenismus und Kaiserzeit - Fallstudien zu multikulturellem Leben in der Antike.

bibl.seg: Cornelia Römer, Why did the Villages in the Themistou Meris Die in the 4th century AD? New Ideas about an Old Problem.

Carolin Arlt & Martin Andreas Stadler (edd.), unter Mitarbeit von Ulrike Weinmann, Das Fayyûm in Hellenismus und Kaiserzeit - Fallstudien zu multikulturellem Leben in der Antike (Wiesbaden, 2013) pp. 169-179, 3 pll.

Elaborated version of a paper given at the International Conference on ""Natural and Cultural Landscapes in the Fayum, Safeguarding and Management of Archaeological Sites and Natural Environments"" organized by the Istituto Italiano di Archeologia, Cairo, in the Auberge du Lac, Fayum, 31 October - 2 November 2010.
